name: iOS 14.0 and iPadOS 14.0
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch 7th generation, iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to cause unexpected system termination or write kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to misuse a trust relationship to download malicious content
advisories.description: A trust issue was addressed by removing a legacy API.

cves.credit: CodeColorist of LightYear Security Lab of AntGroup

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Group Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Group Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie and Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Playing a malicious audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Francis working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative, JunDong Xie of Ant Group Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted text file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin and Junzhi Lu of Trend Micro Mobile Security Research Team working with Trend Micro’s Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved size validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue existed in the processing of font files. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font may result in the disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin & Qi Sun of Trend Micro

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to unexpectedly alter application state
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved setting propagation.

cves.credit: Luyi Xing, Dongfang Zhao, and Xiaofeng Wang of Indiana University Bloomington, Yan Jia of Xidian University and University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, and Bin Yuan of HuaZhong University of Science and Technology

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to identify what other applications a user has installed
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of icon caches.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to execute arbitrary code on a paired device during a debug session over the network
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by encrypting communications over the network to devices running iOS 14, iPadOS 14, tvOS 14, and watchOS 7.

cves.credit: Dany Lisiansky (@DanyL931), Nikias Bassen of Zimperium zLabs

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted tiff file may lead to a denial-of-service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant-Financial Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin of Trend Micro, Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Opening a maliciously crafted PDF file may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read kernel memory
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected system termination or corrupt kernel memory
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to inject into active connections within a VPN tunnel
advisories.description: A routing issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

cves.credit: William J. Tolley, Beau Kujath, and Jedidiah R. Crandall

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Rias A. Sherzad of JAIDE GmbH in Hamburg, Germany

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to unexpectedly alter application state
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Fabian Ising of FH Münster University of Applied Sciences and Damian Poddebniak of FH Münster University of Applied Sciences

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to discover a user’s deleted messages
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved deletion.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Zhiwei Yuan of Trend Micro iCore Team, Junzhi Lu and Mickey Jin of Trend Micro

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: The screen lock may not engage after the specified time period
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious app may be able to determine the existence of files on the computer
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of icon caches.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to determine a user's open tabs in Safari
advisories.description: A validation issue existed in the entitlement verification. This issue was addressed with improved validation of the process entitlement.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling.

cves.credit: Masato Sugiyama (@smasato) of University of Tsukuba, Piotr Duszynski

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to view senstive user information
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to access restricted files
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to view notification contents from the lockscreen
advisories.description: A lock screen issue allowed access to messages on a locked device. This issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher, an anonymous researcher, an anonymous researcher, an anonymous researcher, an anonymous researcher, an anonymous researcher, Andrew Goldberg The University of Texas at Austin, McCombs School of Business, Meli̇h Kerem Güneş of Li̇v College, Sinan Gulguler

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to leak memory
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Multiple issues in SQLite
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating SQLite to version 3.32.3.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted SQL query may lead to data corruption
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: cc working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative
cc working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack
advisories.description: An input validation issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.
